modShortDescription: Just in time to decorate your base for Halloween. This gives you recipes for crafting Gore Blocks, Gravestones, Body Bags, and Coffins.
modDescription:
Just in time to decorate your base for Halloween. This gives you recipes for crafting Gore Blocks, Gravestones, Body Bags, and Coffins.

The coffins are modified copies of the ones in the Vanilla game, so you canâ€™t just craft your own coffins and break them down for Diamonds and stuff. Just wood.

Server side friendly, so just drop in and go.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1V5giNm7Q5JBcYjH2ImuizOBFiK2crrQv)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22346-craft-gore-and-cemetery-items/).
